price: Onaj Koji se nevoljniku, kad Mu se obrati, odaziva, i Koji zlo otklanja i Koji vas na Zemlji namjesnicima postavlja. Zar pored Allaha postoji drugi bog? Kako nikako pouku vi da primite!
arabic: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلۡمُضۡطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكۡشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجۡعَلُكُمۡ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: amman yujību al-muḍ'ṭara idhā daʿāhu wayakshifu al-sūa wayajʿalukum khulafāa al-arḍi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
